rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever another creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then if there are ten or more counters among creatures you control, you may cast a copy of Jinse's back side without paying it's mana cost.
rules_text2: Exile any number of creatures you control with counters on them. Create X 4/4 white Dragon Spirit creature tokens, where X is the number of exiled creatures.
flavor_text2: [i]Jinse represents pure determination, and believes in not letting things go unpunished. [/i]
